trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-UICulture
trans-unit.target: Get-uiculture

trans-unit.source: Get-UICulture
trans-unit.target: Get-uiculture

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Gets the current UI culture settings in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 在操作系统中获取当前 UI 区域性设置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Get-UICulture** cmdlet gets information about the current user interface (UI) culture settings for Windows.
trans-unit.target: **Get-uiculture** cmdlet 可获取有关当前用户的信息适用于 Windows 界面 (UI) 区域性设置。

trans-unit.source: The UI culture determines which text strings are used for user interface elements, such as menus and messages.
trans-unit.target: UI 区域性确定哪些文本字符串用于用户界面元素，例如菜单和消息。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Get-Culture cmdlet, which gets the current culture on the system.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用 Get-Culture cmdlet，可获取系统上的当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: The culture determines the display format of items such as numbers, currency, and dates.
trans-unit.target: 区域性确定项的显示格式，例如数字、货币和日期。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get the UI culture
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 获取用户界面区域性

trans-unit.source: This command gets the current UI culture information.
trans-unit.target: 此命令获取当前 UI 区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get the UI culture and format the results
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 获取 UI 区域性，并设置结果的格式

trans-unit.source: This command displays the values of all of the properties of the current UI culture in a list.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在列表中显示当前 UI 区域性的所有属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get the value of the Calendar property
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 获取的 Calendar 属性的值

trans-unit.source: This command displays the current values for the Calendar property of the current UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 此命令显示当前 UI 区域性的 Calendar 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Calendar is just one property of UI culture.
trans-unit.target: Calendar 只是 UI 区域性的一个属性。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the properties, type `Get-UICulture | Get-Member`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看所有属性，请键入 `Get-UICulture | Get-Member`。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get the short date pattern
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 获取短日期模式

trans-unit.source: This command displays the short date pattern for the current UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 此命令显示当前 UI 区域性的短日期模式。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the subproperties of the DateTimeFormat property of the UI culture, type `(Get-UICulture).DateTimeFormat | gm`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看所有 UI 区域性的 DateTimeFormat 属性的子属性，请键入 `(Get-UICulture).DateTimeFormat | gm`。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Globalization.CultureInfo, Microsoft.PowerShell.VistaCultureInfo
trans-unit.target: System.Globalization.CultureInfo Microsoft.PowerShell.VistaCultureInfo

trans-unit.source: **Get-UICulture** returns an object that represents the current UI culture.
trans-unit.target: **Get-uiculture** 返回一个对象，表示当前 UI 区域性。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 3.0, it returns a **CultureInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，该命令返回 **CultureInfo** 对象。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, it returns a **VistaCultureInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，该命令返回 **VistaCultureInfo** 对象。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: You can also use the $PsCulture and $PsUICulture variables.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用 $PsCulture 和 $PsUICulture 变量。

trans-unit.source: The $PsCulture variable stores the name of the current culture, and the $PsUICulture variable stores the name of the current UI culture.
trans-unit.target: $PsCulture 变量存储当前区域性的名称，$PsUICulture 变量存储当前 UI 区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
